Test Name: EGFR Gene Targeted Mutation Analysis, 51 Mutation Panel
Specimen Type: Tumor tissue (FFPE blocks or fresh-frozen tissue)
Purpose: To detect EGFR gene mutations using a 51-mutation panel for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning in tumor samples.
Container: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue block or appropriate frozen tissue container
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermal cycler, NGS platform compatible with the 51-mutation panel, and bioinformatics software
